name: Elite International Golf: Hyper Turbo
description:
Experience the latest new heart pounding adrenaline pumping NON STOP action of golf as you've NEVER seen it before!

Use A and D keys to adjust the aim, W and S to adjust the power of the stroke and marvel at the intuitive fluid UI! Press E to watch the ball fly and marvel at the higly detailed and realistic physics. Every divot in the golf ball is simulated in real time!
